ISSUE.TITLE: Duplicated ID in Admin Panel
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.00 I've also found a duplicated IDs in Admin panel. Go to Customers -> Edit customer and check the console. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/51123/duplicated-id-in-admin-panel.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #3072 Synchronized the logic of displaying strikethrough price on the catalog page and product details page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2903 Removed duplicated IDs from the customer details page in admin panel
